oai_dc:dc.dc:title: INCORPORATION OF WAVE EFFECTS IN A 3D HYDROSTATIC MEAN CURRENT MODEL
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: de Vriend, H.J.
Kitou, N.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: 3D hydrostatic model
mean current
current model
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The consistency of the mathematical formulation of a 3D hydrostatic current model for coastal areas is discussed. At various points, widely accepted concepts and formulations are shown to lead to inconsistencies, and more consistent alternatives are proposed. Besides, some essential lacunae in our physical knowledge of 3D wave-driven currents are indicated.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 22 (1990): Proceedings of 22nd Conference on Coastal Engineering, Delft, The Netherlands, 1990.
